Welcome to the Hitfel 5!

QUESTION: What type of tutorial are you looking for? (Technical/Normal)?

MESSAGE: So you want to import your game or modify your Hitfel 5 console to your liking! It's simple!
Before we start, make sure to use the Turbowarp version as it sorts the sprites and backdrops out.

QUESTION: What do you want to do with your system? (Import game/Modify system)

MESSAGE: Importing your game is very simple.
In Turbowarp make sure to stick with the folders. Make a folder in the Sprites and Backdrops section titled "Loaded".
Insert all assets into those folders.
Make sure to hide everything when the project starts. Then add your game to the magazine section of the Hitfel 5.
Or make the loaded application redirect to your game.
All you need to do is edit it to your liking, the possibilities are endless.
Don't like the background? Make a new one. Want to re-imagine the whole interface? Do that!
Welcome to the Hitfel 5! Your brand new game console!
The Hitfel 5 itself comes with lots of special features to make it truly yours. Let's learn how to operate your system.
The Power Button allows you to turn off the console and ends all processes.
Aurora is the new virtual assistant replacing the ring. Aurora in the future with your help will be able to do many things.
ProID Exchange returns with the same functionality of pronouncing the connection status of the console.
Loaded is an application that allows you to load a game. No game is by default loaded so you can add your own.
Pressing the "H" button opens the home menu which allows you to exit the application or power off the console.
The Hitfel 5 by default comes with the Hitfel 3 system and menu to play supported Hitfel 3 games.
Well, that's all! If you have any questions, ask ProID Corporation support.
